snippet: If every shooting in a public place led to a new class of law enforcement officers, America would look like a war zone.
abstract: Editorial rejects notion that some Transportation Security Administration screeners should be armed, which was suggested after fatal shooting at Los Angeles International airport; warns if every shooting in a public place led to a new class of enforcement officers, America would look like a war zone.
lead_paragraph: If every shooting in a public place led to a new class of law enforcement officers, America would look like a war zone.

headline.main: Arming the T.S.A. Is Not a Solution
headline.print_headline: Arming the T.S.A. Is Not a Solution
